description: This file manages master GSAP timelines for a scroll-driven web animation, involving DOM sections, 3D scene camera and model components, with responsive behaviors and reduced motion support.

methods.name: collectChapters()
methods.description: Utility to gather DOM sections marked with data attributes, returning an array of chapter info objects.

methods.name: ensureModelPart(obj, scene)
methods.description: Creates placeholder 3D objects if actual model parts are unavailable, ensuring the timeline can animate them.

methods.name: createMasterTimeline({ threeApi, pinTargetSelector = ".canvas-layer", containerSelector = ".sections" })
methods.description: Main exported function that creates a scroll-triggered GSAP timeline controlling 3D camera and model animations, with cleanup support.
